mcq.statement: Which of the following is a correct statement? (a) Each mother has to bring their art work. (b) Each mother has to bring her art work. (c) Every mother have to bring her art work. (d) All mothers has to bring their art work.

options.a: Each mother has to bring their art work.
options.b: Each mother has to bring her art work.
options.c: Every mother have to bring her art work.
options.d: All mothers has to bring their art work.
